goals.active: Search Lamia Mire for the second half of the key.
goals.complete: I searched Lamia Mire, but someone beat me to the second half of the key. Whoever took it smashed open the chest. I'll go see if Tribune Brimstone has any advice.

goals.active: Update Tribune Brimstone on your progress.
goals.complete: Tribune Brimstone believed a scrapper crew took the second half of my sire's key. At his suggestion, I headed to Charrgate Haven to find the scrappers and take back what's mine.
